# Requirements for PEP8, PEP257 and static analysis

-c constraints.txt

flake8==2.5.4 \
    --hash=sha256:fb5a67af4024622287a76abf6b7fe4fb3cfacf765a790976ce64f52c44c88e4a \
    --hash=sha256:cc1e58179f6cf10524c7bfdd378f5536d0a61497688517791639a5ecc867492f

    --hash=sha256:f3d67547f5617a9cfeb4b8097ed94a954888315defaf6e9b518ff1719363bf03
